item.description:
Walk from Mine Falls to downtown Nashua via the trails.

We will be stopping at the City Room Cafe for breakfast/brunch, then walk back.

Approx. a round trip of 5 miles, should take about  2 hr allowing approx 1/2 hr for brunch.

Bring water and/or money to buy water in town for the walk back.

Please be at the start by 9 am; we will leave at 9 sharp.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the Meetup sign on a black Subaru

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Mine Falls Walk to Brunch
